thread.title: Jason C.
thread.title_full: Diesel Ops reviewed by Jason C.

author: Jason C.
title: Jason C.
text: I worked directly with Corey to get all of the parts I needed for my 2011 Ram. He went above and beyond to answer my questions, explain my options, and created the best package deal. I had an issue outside of his control and he resolved it immediately. Hands down, one of the best customer service experiences I have ever had!
